name: Anthony LOMAX, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: Anthony LOMAX, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert B. Stewart, III, Huntington, for appellant.
Robert, A. Greevy, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
569 A.2d 928
Anthony LOMAX, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 26, 1990.
Decided Feb. 6, 1990.
Robert B. Stewart, III, Huntington, for appellant.
Robert, A. Greevy, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
